TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Label extends System.Windows.Forms.Label

summary.span: 表示可添加到 Microsoft Office Word 文档的 Windows 窗体 。

span.span: Represents a Windows Forms that can be added to a Microsoft Office Word document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同于。The is different from a . 具有支持可将其添加到 Word 文档并，使其具有更多的方法和属性的其他成员。The has additional members that enable it to be added to a Word document and that give it additional methods and properties. 不使用构造函数创建新。Do not use the constructor to create a new . 使用方法添加新到文档。Use the method to add a new to a document.

summary.span: 获取 的下边缘与该文档的上边缘之间的距离（以磅为单位）。

span.span: The distance, in points, between the bottom edge of the and the top edge of the document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值等于的总和属性值和属性值。The value of this property is equal to the sum of the property value and the property value. 属性使用点，而属性使用像素值。The property uses points, whereas the property uses pixels. ## Examples 有关演示如何使用此属性的代码示例，请参阅。For a code example that demonstrates how to use this property, see . 中的所有控件命名空间具有在功能上等效`Bottom`属性。All controls in the namespace have a functionally equivalent `Bottom` property.

span.span: Deletes a dynamically created from the document and removes it from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法仅应该用于，在运行时以编程方式创建。This method should only be used with a that is created programmatically at run time. 如果在调用此方法引发异常，它在设计时添加到文档。An exception is thrown if you call this method on a that is added to the document at design time. ## Examples 有关演示如何使用此方法的代码示例，请参阅。For a code example that demonstrates how to use this method, see . 中的所有控件命名空间具有在功能上等效`Delete`方法。All controls in the namespace have a functionally equivalent `Delete` method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够获得文档上控件的确切位置。The property enables you to get the exact position of the control on the document. 如果该控件的换行样式未设置为**与文本对齐**、属性返回`null`。If the wrapping style of the control is not set to **In line with text**, the property returns `null`.

value.span: 以磅为单位的左边缘之间的距离和文档的左边的缘。

span.span: The distance, in points, between the left edge of the and the left edge of the document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使用点，而属性使用像素值。The property uses points, whereas property uses pixels. 你只能使用属性不与文本对齐的控件。You can only use the property of a control that is not in line with text. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在运行时向 Office 文档添加控件](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md)。For more information, see [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md). ## Examples 有关演示如何使用此属性的代码示例，请参阅。For a code example that demonstrates how to use this property, see . 中的所有控件命名空间具有在功能上等效`Left`属性。All controls in the namespace have a functionally equivalent `Left` property.
